title: Update alternate contact number in business configuration

requirements.summary: Update the alternate phone number to 7981314611 in constants and ensure all UI references display the updated number
acceptanceCriteria: The alternate contact number in frontend/src/config/constants.ts is set to 7981314611.
All UI locations that display the alternate phone number now show 7981314611.
The primary/main phone number and WhatsApp link remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the alternate phone number constant to '7981314611'. Locate the existing alternate phone number field in the constants object and replace its value while leaving all other constants (primary phone, WhatsApp link, owner phone numbers) unchanged.

Verify that the Layout component (header and footer) correctly references the alternate phone number from constants.ts. If the alternate number is displayed in the header or footer contact info, ensure it pulls from the updated constant. No changes needed if the component already imports and uses the constant correctly.

Review any contact information sections on the Catalog page. If the alternate phone number is displayed (e.g., in a contact info banner, help section, or customer support area), ensure it references the updated constant from constants.ts. Update the import and usage if needed.
